Hey guys sorry ive been away for a while, TPB had reset the passwords to all vip and trusted members and i was having a slight problem getting my reset. anyways with that i got a fancy new green skull! i will start uploading again shortly.

and to adress jack sin.

that fact of the matter is, now a days most of the tv torrents you download are from a HD tv signal, that are actually better quality then the MPEG2 encoded dvds. to be honest the quality of some of the tv are infact better quality. HDTV rips are from a HD source they have a lot more to work with. And depending on what show im ripping, they may put 8-10 episodes onto one dvd, so instead of compressing a show that is in HD and roughly around 2gigs, im compressing a show that is 720x480 and anywhere from 600-900mbs.

HD tv is amazing picture, dvds are what they are. I dont claim that my rips are the best looking video out there, but i assure you that they are the best "dvdrips" availible

i should also mention, of course with a larger file size they could be better, but i choose to encode them with what people are familiar with. When i started releasing stuff it was so people could see great shows that they may not have seen before. And there hasnt really been anyone that ive seen that just rips tv series. If more then anything i wanted to archive these shows so people may be able to watch the years down the road.

lets hope all those words make sense
